verses.roman:
tā'-sabāra stuti kare,--tomarā bhāgyavān
kṛtārtha karile more śunāñā hari-nāma

synonyms: tā'-sabāra—of all of them; stuti kare—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu praised the behavior; tomarā—you; bhāgyavān—fortunate; kṛta-artha—successful; karile—you have made; more—to Me; śunāñā—by chanting; hari-nāma—the holy name of Lord Hari.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu thus blessed them all, saying that they were all fortunate. In this way He praised them, and He felt very successful because they chanted the holy name of Lord Hari.
